Text: how do i put english subs

@ayzen13:

In the same folder [in the movie folder you must have the movie file .avi and the english .srt file renamed with the same name as the movie]

Use BSPlayer, VLC Player, MediaPlayer Classic, KMPlayer...all of them are advanced soft multimedia players on Windows PC !!

Good Luck !
I was having subtitle problems which you solved. Many thanks.
